price: Kuma a lõkacin da Muka iyãkance* wa Ibrãhim wurin ¦akin (Muka ce masa), "Kada ka haɗa kõme da Ni ga bauta, kuma ka tsarkake daki Na dõmin mãsu ɗawãfi da mãsu tsayuwa da mãsu ruku'u da mãsu sujada.
arabic: وَإِذۡ بَوَّأۡنَا لِإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ مَكَانَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ أَن لَّا تُشۡرِكۡ بِي شَيۡـٔٗا وَطَهِّرۡ بَيۡتِيَ لِلطَّآئِفِينَ وَٱلۡقَآئِمِينَ وَٱلرُّكَّعِ ٱلسُّجُودِ
footnotes: * Allah Ya nũna wa Ibrahĩm iyãkar Ɗãkin Ka'aba da iska, sa'an nan ya fãra ginashi, kuma Ya nuna masa iyãkõkin Hurumin Makka, ya sanya alãmõmi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
